subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Since playing for Cleveland in 9 of his first 10 full seasons in the majors, outfielder Kenny Lofton, now with Texas, has not played for any team for more than a season.
snippet: Since playing for Cleveland in 9 of his first 10 full seasons in the majors, outfielder Kenny Lofton, now with Texas, has not played for any team for more than a season.
